posts.post_content:
In case anyone's confused: This is extra mana, early or late, for blue decks. That's "blue", with a ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol).  
  
Thought I should say something. Judging by the relatively low rating it, looks like some of you forgot. Unless you're docking it a point for the *fabulous* pose he's striking in that picture, in which case you're absolutely right. Carry on.

Posted By: JFM2796 (8/20/2011 11:11:31 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I don't think they used this art because they thought it was better. Just having multiple arts increases the collectibility so much.   
There are interesting things that come up when you use two of the same card from different sets, or with alternate art. Even basic lands. Did you play a land different than the one you just tutored for? Then you aren't mana screwed. Simple information things like that.
